articles.title: Everton manager Frank Lampard defends Anthony Gordon against after accusations of diving - Daily Mail
articles.description: Everton manager Frank Lampard has strongly defended young forward Anthony Gordon against suggestions he is a diver.The 21-year-old was booked for simulation in the Merseyside derby.
articles.content:
